alstory:echo-proklyatiya-desc:
Old man Elrik asks you to follow the traces of the Order of the Doomed. Their armor once granted strength — and devoured the soul.

Find the remnants and bring this story closer to an end.
alstory:echo-proklyatiya-journal-text:
On a cursed hill I met an old man named Elrik. He spoke of the Order of the Doomed — knights who tried to fight the Rot using its own power.

He wants me to find the pieces of their armor and bring this tale to rest.
alstory:echo-proklyatiya-reward-journal-: I walked the Order's trail: a grim cult camp, a tower, and a village where the ground itself pulses with Rot. This story is not finished yet.
alstory:no-quest-available-elrik: Elrik: Silence is all that's left. No more work.
alstory:no-quest-available-elrik-cooldow: Elrik: Too soon. Come back in {0} days.
alstory:dialogue-elrik-intro: A shadow. An echo. A stubborn one who refuses to become dust. Leave, before my fate becomes yours.
alstory:dialogue-elrik-quests: Do you have work for me?
alstory:dialogue-elrik-who-answer: I am Elrik. The last who still remembers clean air.
alstory:dialogue-elrik-what-answer: The Order of the Doomed tried to forge strength from the Rot. The armor gave power — and ate the soul. Our Magister, Loran, did something dreadful. Find the traces.
alstory:dialogue-elrik-close-answer: Go. And don't listen to the whispers at night.
alstory:final-elrik-text:
You stepped onto the Doomed one's trail. Do not believe it's only iron and armor. It's a debt still whispering in the void.

Continue. But remember: every fight with darkness must end — or you will become part of it.
alstory:ritual-crystals-desc: In the villagers' settlement the Sacrificial Stone pulses. To get to the truth, you must weaken the bond between the Stone and the village by destroying three Taint Crystals.
alstory:ritual-crystals-journal-text: At the center of the settlement stands a Sacrificial Stone, and beneath it veins of Rot pulse like roots. To weaken the Weaving of Life, I must destroy three Taint Crystals placed at tension points.
alstory:final-village-text: The bond weakens. The Rot's music grows quieter. It's only a step, but now the path points toward the dead kings and the one who still clings to his vow.
alstory:fallen-magister-desc: The trail leads to the final location. Among stone and silence, Loran awaits — and the decision that ends the play.
alstory:fallen-magister-journal-text: Illa said Loran went where the dead kings sleep. If this chapter can be closed, it will be there.
alstory:final-necropolis-text: You reached the final location. Beyond this point lies the meeting with the one who burned a garden to save a single flower. Here the road ends — and the choice begins.
